info.author: asmith

topic.name: Psionics
topic.para: This material is Open Game Content, and is licensed for public use under the terms of the Open Game License v1.0a.

topic.name: Power List
topic.para: Power List
An A appearing at the end of a power's name in the power lists denotes an augmentable power. An X denotes a power with an XP component paid by the manifester.

topic.name: Power Chains
topic.para: Power Chains: Some powers reference other powers that they are based upon. Only information in a power later in the power chain that is different from the base power is covered in the power being described. Header entries and other information that are the same as the base power are not repeated. The same holds true for powers that are the equivalents of spells, only the way the power varies from the spell is noted, such as power point cost.

topic.name: Order of Presentation
topic.para: Order of Presentation: In the power lists and the power descriptions that follow them, the powers are presented in alphabetical order by name-except for those belonging to certain power chains and those that are psionic equivalents of spells. When a power's name begins with 'lesser,' 'greater,' 'mass,' or a similar kind of qualifier, the power description is alphabetized under the second word of the power description instead. When the effect of a power is essentially the same as that of a spell, the power's name is simply 'Psionic' followed by the name of the spell, and it is alphabetized according to the spell name.

topic.name: Manifester Level
topic.para: Manifester Level: A power's effect often depends on the manifester level, which is the manifester's psionic class level. A creature with no classes has a manifester level equal to its Hit Dice unless otherwise specified. The word 'level' in the power lists always refers to manifester level.

topic.name: Creatures and Characters
topic.para: Creatures and Characters: 'Creatures' and 'characters' are used synonymously in the power descriptions.

topic.name: Augment
topic.para: Augment: Many powers vary in strength depending on how many power points you put into them. The more power points you spend, the more powerful the manifestation. However, you can spend only a total number of points on a power equal to your manifester level, unless you have an ability that increases your effective manifester level.

Many powers can be augmented in more than one way. When the Augment section contains numbered paragraphs, you need to spend power points separately for each of the numbered options. When a paragraph in the Augment section begins with 'In addition,' you gain the indicated benefit according to how many power points you have already decided to spend on manifesting the power.

topic.name: Psion/Wilder Powers
topic.para: Psion/Wilder Powers

topic.name: 1st-Level Psion/Wilder Powers
topic.para: 1ST-LEVEL PSION/WILDER POWERS

topic.name: Astral Traveler
topic.para: Astral Traveler: Enable yourself or another to join an astral caravan-enabled trip.

topic.name: Attraction
topic.para: AttractionA: Subject has an attraction you specify.

topic.name: Bolt
topic.para: BoltA: You create a few enhanced short-lived bolts, arrows, or bullets.

topic.name: Call to Mind
topic.para: Call to Mind: Gain additional Knowledge check with +4 competence bonus.

topic.name: Catfall
topic.para: CatfallA: Instantly save yourself from a fall.

topic.name: Conceal Thoughts
topic.para: Conceal Thoughts: You conceal your motives.

topic.name: Control Flames
topic.para: Control FlamesA: Take control of nearby open flame.

topic.name: Control Light
topic.para: Control Light: Adjust ambient light levels.

topic.name: Create Sound
topic.para: Create Sound: Create the sound you desire.

topic.name: Crystal Shard
topic.para: Crystal ShardA: Ranged touch attack for 1d6 points of piercing damage.

topic.name: Daze, Psionic
topic.para: Daze, PsionicA: Humanoid creature of 4 HD or less loses next action.

topic.name: Deceleration
topic.para: DecelerationA: Target's speed is halved.

topic.name: D�J� Vu
topic.para: D�j� VuA: Your target repeats his last action.

topic.name: Demoralize
topic.para: DemoralizeA: Enemies become shaken.

topic.name: Detect Psionics
topic.para: Detect Psionics: You detect the presence of psionics.

topic.name: Disable
topic.para: DisableA: Subjects incorrectly believe they are disabled.

topic.name: Dissipating Touch
topic.para: Dissipating TouchA: Touch deals 1d6 damage.

topic.name: Distract
topic.para: Distract: Target gets -4 bonus on Listen, Search, Sense Motive, and Spot checks.

topic.name: Ecto Protection
topic.para: Ecto ProtectionA: An astral construct gains bonus against dismiss ectoplasm.

topic.name: Empathy
topic.para: EmpathyA: You know the subject's surface emotions.

topic.name: Empty Mind
topic.para: Empty MindA: You gain +2 on Will saves until your next action.

topic.name: Energy Ray
topic.para: Energy RayA: Deal 1d6 energy (cold, electricity, fire, or sonic) damage.

topic.name: Entangling Ectoplasm
topic.para: Entangling Ectoplasm: You entangle a foe in sticky goo.

topic.name: Far Hand
topic.para: Far HandA: Move small objects at a limited distance.

topic.name: Float
topic.para: FloatA: You buoy yourself in water or other liquid.

topic.name: Force Screen
topic.para: Force ScreenA: Invisible disc provides +4 shield bonus to AC.

topic.name: Grease, Psionic
topic.para: Grease, Psionic: Makes 10-ft. square or one object slippery.

topic.name: Hammer
topic.para: HammerA: Melee touch attack deals 1d8/round.

topic.name: Inertial Armor
topic.para: Inertial ArmorA: Tangible field of force provides you with +4 armor bonus to AC.

topic.name: Know Direction and Location
topic.para: Know Direction and Location: You discover where you are and what direction you face.

topic.name: Matter Agitation
topic.para: Matter Agitation: You heat a creature or object.

topic.name: Mind Thrust
topic.para: Mind ThrustA: Deal 1d10 damage.

topic.name: Missive
topic.para: MissiveA: Send a one-way telepathic message to subject.

topic.name: My Light
topic.para: My LightA: Your eyes emit 20-ft. cone of light.

topic.name: Precognition, Defensive
topic.para: Precognition, DefensiveA: Gain +1 insight bonus to AC and saving throws.

topic.name: Precognitionion, Offensive
topic.para: Precognitionion, OffensiveA: Gain +1 insight bonus on your attack rolls.

topic.name: Prescience, Offensive
topic.para: Prescience, OffensiveA: Gain +2 insight bonus on your damage rolls.

topic.name: Sense Link
topic.para: Sense LinkA: You sense what the subject senses (single sense).

topic.name: Skate
topic.para: Skate: Subject slides skillfully along the ground.

topic.name: Synesthete
topic.para: Synesthete: You receive one kind of sense when another sense is stimulated.

topic.name: Telempathic Projection
topic.para: Telempathic Projection: Alter the subject's mood.

topic.name: Vigor
topic.para: VigorA: Gain 5 temporary hit points.

topic.name: 2nd-Level Psion/Wilder Powers
topic.para: 2ND-LEVEL PSION/WILDER POWERS

topic.name: Bestow Power
topic.para: Bestow PowerA: Subject receives 2 power points.

topic.name: Biofeedback
topic.para: BiofeedbackA: Gain damage reduction 2/-.

topic.name: Body Equilibrium
topic.para: Body Equilibrium: You can walk on nonsolid surfaces.

topic.name: Cloud Mind
topic.para: Cloud Mind: You erase knowledge of your presence from target's mind.

topic.name: Concealing Amorpha
topic.para: Concealing Amorpha: Quasi-real membrane grants you concealment.

topic.name: Concussion Blast
topic.para: Concussion BlastA: Deal 1d6 force damage to target.

topic.name: Control Sound
topic.para: Control Sound: Create very specific sounds.

topic.name: Detect Hostile Intent
topic.para: Detect Hostile Intent: You can detect hostile creatures within 30 ft. of you.

topic.name: Ego Whip
topic.para: Ego WhipA: Deal 1d4 Cha damage and daze for 1 round.

topic.name: Elfsight
topic.para: Elfsight: Gain low-light vision, +2 bonus on Search and Spot checks, and notice secret doors.

topic.name: Energy Adaptation, Specified
topic.para: Energy Adaptation, SpecifiedA: Gain resistance 10 against one energy type.

topic.name: Energy Push
topic.para: Energy PushA: Deal 2d6 damage and knock subject back.

topic.name: Energy Stun
topic.para: Energy StunA: Deal 1d6 damage and stun target if it fails both saves.

topic.name: Feat Leech
topic.para: Feat LeechA: Borrow another's psionic or metapsionic feats.

topic.name: Id Insinuation
topic.para: Id InsinuationA: Swift tendrils of thought disrupt and confuse your target.

topic.name: Identify, Psionic
topic.para: Identify, Psionic: Learn the properties of a psionic item.

topic.name: Inflict Pain
topic.para: Inflict PainA: Telepathic stab gives your foe -4 on attack rolls, or -2 if he makes the save.

topic.name: Knock, Psionic
topic.para: Knock, Psionic: Opens locked or psionically sealed door.

topic.name: Levitate, Psionic
topic.para: Levitate, Psionic: You move up and down, forward and back via mental support.

topic.name: Mental Disruption
topic.para: Mental DisruptionA: Daze creatures within 10 feet for 1 round.

topic.name: Missive, Mass
topic.para: Missive, MassA: You send a one-way telepathic message to an area.

topic.name: Psionic Lock
topic.para: Psionic Lock: Secure a door, chest, or portal.

topic.name: Recall Agony
topic.para: Recall AgonyA: Foe takes 2d6 damage.

topic.name: Sense Link, Forced
topic.para: Sense Link, Forced: Sense what subject senses.

topic.name: Share Pain
topic.para: Share Pain: Willing subject takes some of your damage.

topic.name: Sustenance
topic.para: Sustenance: Go without food and water for one day.

topic.name: Swarm of Crystals
topic.para: Swarm of CrystalsA: Crystal shards are sprayed forth doing 3d4 slashing damage.

topic.name: Thought Shield
topic.para: Thought ShieldA: Gain PR 13 against mind-affecting powers.

topic.name: Tongues, Psionic
topic.para: Tongues, Psionic: You can communicate with intelligent creatures.

topic.name: 3rd-Level Psion/Wilder Powers
topic.para: 3RD-LEVEL PSION/WILDER POWERS

topic.name: Body Adjustment
topic.para: Body AdjustmentA: You heal 1d12 damage.

topic.name: Body Purification
topic.para: Body PurificationA: You restore 2 points of ability damage.

topic.name: Danger Sense
topic.para: Danger SenseA: You gain +4 bonus against traps.

topic.name: Darkvision, Psionic
topic.para: Darkvision, Psionic: See 60 ft. in total darkness.

topic.name: Dismiss Ectoplasm
topic.para: Dismiss Ectoplasm: Dissipates ectoplasmic targets and effects.

topic.name: Dispel Psionics
topic.para: Dispel PsionicsA: Cancels psionic powers and effects.

topic.name: Energy Bolt
topic.para: Energy BoltA: Deal 5d6 energy damage in 120-ft. line.

topic.name: Energy Burst
topic.para: Energy BurstA: Deal 5d6 energy damage in 40-ft. burst.

topic.name: Energy Retort
topic.para: Energy RetortA: Ectoburst of energy automatically targets your attacker for 4d6 damage once each round.

topic.name: Energy Wall
topic.para: Energy Wall: Create wall of your chosen energy type.

topic.name: Eradicate Invisibility
topic.para: Eradicate InvisibilityA: Negate invisibility in 50-ft. burst.

topic.name: Keen Edge, Psionic
topic.para: Keen Edge, Psionic: Doubles normal weapon's threat range.

topic.name: Mental Barrier
topic.para: Mental BarrierA: Gain +4 deflection bonus to AC until your next action.

topic.name: Mind Trap
topic.para: Mind TrapA: Drain 1d6 power points from anyone who attacks you with a telepathy power.

topic.name: Psionic Blast
topic.para: Psionic Blast: Stun creatures in 30-ft. cone for 1 round.

topic.name: Share Pain, Forced
topic.para: Share Pain, ForcedA: Unwilling subject takes some of your damage.

topic.name: Solicit Psicrystal
topic.para: Solicit PsicrystalA: Your psicrystal takes over your concentration power.

topic.name: Telekinetic Force
topic.para: Telekinetic ForceA: Move an object with the sustained force of your mind.

topic.name: Telekinetic Thrust
topic.para: Telekinetic ThrustA: Hurl objects with the force of your mind.

topic.name: Time Hop
topic.para: Time HopA: Subject hops forward in time 1 round/level.

topic.name: Touchsight
topic.para: TouchsightA: Your telekinetic field tells you where everything is.

topic.name: Ubiquitous Vision
topic.para: Ubiquitous Vision: You have all-around vision.

topic.name: 4th-Level Psion/Wilder Powers
topic.para: 4TH-LEVEL PSION/WILDER POWERS

topic.name: Aura Sight
topic.para: Aura SightA: Reveals creatures, objects, powers, or spells of selected alignment axis.

topic.name: Correspond
topic.para: Correspond: Hold mental conversation with another creature at any distance.

topic.name: Death Urge
topic.para: Death UrgeA: Implant a self-destructive compulsion.

topic.name: Detect Remote Viewing
topic.para: Detect Remote Viewing: You know when others spy on you remotely.

topic.name: Dimension Door, Psionic
topic.para: Dimension Door, Psionic: Teleports you short distance.

topic.name: Divination, Psionic
topic.para: Divination, Psionic: Provides useful advice for specific proposed action.

topic.name: Empathic Feedback
topic.para: Empathic FeedbackA: When you are hit in melee, your attacker takes damage.

topic.name: Energy Adaptation
topic.para: Energy AdaptationA: Your body converts energy to harmless light.

topic.name: Freedom of Movement, Psionic
topic.para: Freedom of Movement, Psionic: You cannot be held or otherwise rendered immobile.

topic.name: Intellect Fortress
topic.para: Intellect FortressA: Those inside fortress take only half damage from all powers and psi-like abilities until your next action.

topic.name: Mindwipe
topic.para: MindwipeA: Subject's recent experiences wiped away, bestowing negative levels.

topic.name: Personality Parasite
topic.para: Personality Parasite: Subject's mind calves self-antagonistic splinter personality for 1 round/level.

topic.name: Power Leech
topic.para: Power Leech: Drain 1d6 power points/round while you maintain concentration; you gain 1/round.

topic.name: Psychic Reformation
topic.para: Psychic ReformationX: Subject can choose skills, feats, and powers anew for previous levels.

topic.name: Telekinetic Maneuver
topic.para: Telekinetic ManeuverA: Telekinetically bull rush, disarm, grapple, or trip your target.

topic.name: Trace Teleport
topic.para: Trace TeleportA: Learn destination of subject's teleport.

topic.name: Wall of Ectoplasm
topic.para: Wall of Ectoplasm: You create a protective barrier.

topic.name: 5th-Level Psion/Wilder Powers
topic.para: 5TH-LEVEL PSION/WILDER POWERS

topic.name: Adapt Body
topic.para: Adapt Body: Your body automatically adapts to hostile environments.

topic.name: Catapsi
topic.para: CatapsiA: Psychic static inhibits power manifestation.

topic.name: Ectoplasmic Shambler
topic.para: Ectoplasmic Shambler: Foglike predator deals 1 point of damage/two levels each round to an area.

topic.name: Incarnate
topic.para: IncarnateX: Make some powers permanent.

topic.name: Leech Field
topic.para: Leech FieldA: Leech power points each time you make a saving throw.

topic.name: Major Creation, Psionic
topic.para: Major Creation, Psionic: As psionic minor creation, plus stone and metal.

topic.name: Plane Shift, Psionic
topic.para: Plane Shift, Psionic: Travel to other planes.

topic.name: Power Resistance
topic.para: Power Resistance: Grant PR equal to 12 + level.

topic.name: Psychic Crush
topic.para: Psychic CrushA: Brutally crush subject's mental essence, reducing subject to -1 hit points.

topic.name: Shatter Mind Blank
topic.para: Shatter Mind Blank: Cancels target's mind blank effect.

topic.name: Tower of Iron Will
topic.para: Tower of Iron WillA: Grant PR 19 against mind-affecting powers to all creatures within 10 ft. until your next turn.

topic.name: True Seeing, Psionic
topic.para: True Seeing, PsionicA: See all things as they really are.

topic.name: 6th-Level Psion/Wilder Powers
topic.para: 6TH-LEVEL PSION/WILDER POWERS

topic.name: Aura Alteration
topic.para: Aura AlterationA: Repairs psyche or makes subject seem to be something it is not.

topic.name: Breath of the Black Dragon
topic.para: Breath of the Black DragonA: Breathe acid for 11d6 damage.

topic.name: Cloud Mind, Mass
topic.para: Cloud Mind, Mass: Erase knowledge of your presence from the minds of one creature/level.

topic.name: Contingency, Psionic
topic.para: Contingency, PsionicX: Sets trigger condition for another power.

topic.name: Co-Opt Concentration
topic.para: Co-opt Concentration: Take control of foe's concentration power.

topic.name: Disintegrate, Psionic
topic.para: Disintegrate, PsionicA: Turn one creature or object to dust.

topic.name: Fuse Flesh
topic.para: Fuse FleshA: Fuse subject's flesh, creating a helpless mass.

topic.name: Overland Flight, Psionic
topic.para: Overland Flight, Psionic: You fly at a speed of 40 ft. and can hustle over long distances.

topic.name: Remote View Trap
topic.para: Remote View Trap: Deal 8d6 points electricity damage to those who seek to view you at a distance.

topic.name: Retrieve
topic.para: RetrieveA: Teleport to your hand an item you can see.

topic.name: Suspend Life
topic.para: Suspend Life: Put yourself in a state akin to suspended animation.

topic.name: Temporal Acceleration
topic.para: Temporal AccelerationA: Your time frame accelerates for 1 round.

topic.name: 7th-Level Psion/Wilder Powers
topic.para: 7TH-LEVEL PSION/WILDER POWERS

topic.name: Decerebrate
topic.para: Decerebrate: Remove portion of subject's brain stem.

topic.name: Divert Teleport
topic.para: Divert Teleport: Choose destination for another's teleport.

topic.name: Energy Conversion
topic.para: Energy Conversion: Offensively channel energy you've absorbed.

topic.name: Energy Wave
topic.para: Energy WaveA: Deal 13d4 damage of your chosen energy type in 120-ft. cone.

topic.name: Evade Burst
topic.para: Evade BurstA: You take no damage from a burst on a successful Reflex save.

topic.name: Insanity
topic.para: InsanityA: Subject is permanently confused.

topic.name: Mind Blank, Personal
topic.para: Mind Blank, Personal: You are immune to scrying and mental effects.

topic.name: Moment of Prescience, Psionic
topic.para: Moment of Prescience, Psionic: You gain insight bonus on single attack roll, check, or save.

topic.name: Oak Body
topic.para: Oak BodyA: Your body becomes as hard as oak.

topic.name: Phase Door, Psionic
topic.para: Phase Door, Psionic: Invisible passage through wood or stone.

topic.name: Sequester, Psionic
topic.para: Sequester, PsionicX: Subject invisible to sight and remote viewing; renders subject comatose.

topic.name: Ultrablast
topic.para: UltrablastA: Deal 13d6 damage in 15-ft. radius.

topic.name: 8th-Level Psion/Wilder Powers
topic.para: 8TH-LEVEL PSION/WILDER POWERS

topic.name: Bend Reality
topic.para: Bend RealityX: Alters reality within power limits.

topic.name: Iron Body, Psionic
topic.para: Iron Body, Psionic: Your body becomes living iron.

topic.name: Matter Manipulation
topic.para: Matter ManipulationX: Increase or decrease an object's base hardness by 5.

topic.name: Mind Blank, Psionic
topic.para: Mind Blank, Psionic: Subject immune to mental/emotional effects, scrying, and remote viewing.

topic.name: Recall Death
topic.para: Recall Death: Subject dies or takes 5d6 damage.

topic.name: Shadow Body
topic.para: Shadow Body: You become a living shadow (not the creature).

topic.name: Teleport, Psionic Greater
topic.para: Teleport, Psionic Greater: As psionic teleport, but no range limit and no off-target arrival.

topic.name: True Metabolism
topic.para: True Metabolism: You regenerate 10 hit points/round.

topic.name: 9th-Level Psion/Wilder Powers
topic.para: 9TH-LEVEL PSION/WILDER POWERS

topic.name: Affinity Field
topic.para: Affinity Field: Effects that affect you also affect others.

topic.name: Apopsi
topic.para: ApopsiX: You delete target's psionic powers.

topic.name: Assimilate
topic.para: Assimilate: Incorporate creature into your own body.
Etherealness, Psionic: Become ethereal for 1 min./level.

topic.name: Microcosm
topic.para: MicrocosmA: Creature or creature lives forevermore in world of his own imagination.

topic.name: Reality Revision
topic.para: Reality RevisionX: As bend reality, but fewer limits.

topic.name: Timeless Body
topic.para: Timeless Body: Ignore all harmful, and helpful, effects for 1 round.

topic.name: Psion Discipline Powers
topic.para: Psion Discipline Powers

topic.name: Egoist
topic.para: Egoist (Psychometabolism) Discipline Powers

topic.name: 1thicken Skin
topic.para: 1Thicken SkinA: Gain +1 enhancement bonus to your AC for 10 min./level.
2Animal AffinityA: Gain +4 enhancement to one ability.

topic.name: Chameleon
topic.para: Chameleon: Gain +10 enhancement bonus on Hide checks.

topic.name: Empathic Transfer
topic.para: Empathic TransferA: Transfer another's wounds to yourself.
3Ectoplasmic Form: You gain benefits of being insubstantial and can fly slowly.

topic.name: Hustle
topic.para: Hustle: Instantly gain a move action.
4Metamorphosis: Assume shape of creature or object.

topic.name: Psychic Vampire
topic.para: Psychic Vampire: Touch attack drains 2 power points/level from foe.
5Psionic RevivifyA X. Return the dead to life before the psyche leaves the corpse.

topic.name: Psychofeedback
topic.para: Psychofeedback: Boost Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution at the expense of one or more other scores.

topic.name: Restore Extremity
topic.para: Restore Extremity: Return a lost digit, limb, or other appendage to subject.
6Restoration, Psionic: Restores level and ability score drains.
7Fission: You briefly duplicate yourself.
8FusionX: You combine your abilities and form with another.
9Metamorphosis, GreaterX: Assume shape of any nonunique creature or object each round.

topic.name: Kineticist
topic.para: Kineticist (Psychokinesis) Discipline Powers
1Control Object: Telekinetically animate a small object.
2Control AirA: You have control over wind speed and direction.

topic.name: Energy Missile
topic.para: Energy MissileA: Deal 3d6 energy damage to up to five subjects.
3Energy ConeA: Deal 5d6 energy damage in 60-ft. cone.
4Control BodyA: Take rudimentary control of your foe's limbs.

topic.name: Energy Ball
topic.para: Energy BallA: Deal 7d6 energy damage in 20-ft. radius.

topic.name: Inertial Barrier
topic.para: Inertial Barrier: Gain damage reduction 5/-.
5Energy CurrentA: Deal 9d6 damage to one foe and half to another foe as long as you concentrate.

topic.name: Fiery Discorporation
topic.para: Fiery DiscorporationA: Cheat death by discorporating into nearby fire for one day.
6Dispelling Buffer: Subject is buffered from one dispel psionics effect.

topic.name: Null Psionics Field
topic.para: Null Psionics Field: Create a field where psionic power does not function.
7Reddopsi: Powers targeting you rebound on manifester.
8Telekinetic Sphere, Psionic: Mobile force globe encapsulates creature and moves it.
9Tornado BlastA: Vortex of air subjects your foes to 17d6 damage and moves them.

topic.name: Nomad
topic.para: Nomad (Psychoportation) Discipline Powers
1Burst: Gain +10 ft. to speed this round.

topic.name: Detect Teleportation
topic.para: Detect TeleportationA: Know when teleportation powers are used in close range.
2Dimension SwapA: You and ally or two allies switch positions.

topic.name: Levitate, Psionic
topic.para: Levitate, Psionic: Subject moves up and down, forward and back, at your direction.
3Astral CaravanA: You lead astral traveler-enabled group to a planar destination.
4Dimensional Anchor, Psionic: Bars extra dimensional movement.

topic.name: Dismissal, Psionic
topic.para: Dismissal, Psionic: Forces a creature to return to its native plane.

topic.name: Fly, Psionic
topic.para: Fly, Psionic: You fly at a speed of 60 ft.
5Baleful TeleportA: Destructive teleport deals 9d6 damage.

topic.name: Teleport, Psionic
topic.para: Teleport, Psionic: Instantly transports you as far as 100 miles/level.

topic.name: Teleport Trigger
topic.para: Teleport Trigger: Predetermined event triggers teleport.
6Banishment, PsionicA: Banishes extraplanar creatures.
7Dream TravelA: Travel to other places through dreams.

topic.name: Ethereal Jaunt, Psionic
topic.para: Ethereal Jaunt, Psionic: Become ethereal for 1 round/level.
8Time Hop, MassA: Willing subjects hop forward in time.
9Teleportation Circle, Psionic: Circle teleports any creatures inside to designated spot.
Time RegressionX: Relive the last round.

topic.name: Seer
topic.para: Seer (Clairsentience) Discipline Powers
1Destiny Dissonance: Your dissonant touch sickens a foe.

topic.name: Precognition
topic.para: Precognition: Gain +2 insight bonus to one roll.
2Clairvoyant Sense: See and hear a distant location.

topic.name: Object Reading
topic.para: Object ReadingA: Learn details about an object's previous owner.

topic.name: Sensitivity to Psychic Impressions
topic.para: Sensitivity to Psychic Impressions: You can find out about an area's past.
3Escape Detection: You become difficult to detect with clairsentience powers.

topic.name: Fate Link
topic.para: Fate LinkA: You link the fates of two targets.
4Anchored NavigationA: Establish a mishap-free teleport beacon.

topic.name: Remote Viewing
topic.para: Remote ViewingX: See, hear, and potentially interact with subjects at a distance.
5Clairtangent HandA: Emulate far hand at a distance.

topic.name: Second Chance
topic.para: Second Chance: Gain a reroll.
6Precognition, Greater: Gain +4 insight bonus to one roll.
7Fate of One: Reroll any roll you just failed.
8Hypercognition: You can deduce almost anything.
9MetafacultyX: You learn details about any one creature.

topic.name: Shaper
topic.para: Shaper (Metacreativity) Discipline Powers

topic.name: Astral Construct
topic.para: 1 Astral ConstructA: Creates astral construct to fight for you.

topic.name: Minor Creation, Psionic
topic.para: Minor Creation, Psionic: Creates one cloth or wood object.

topic.name: Psionic Repair Damage
topic.para: 2 Psionic Repair Damage: Repairs construct of 3d8 hit points +1 hp/level.

topic.name: Concealing Amorpha, Greater
topic.para: 3 Concealing Amorpha, Greater: Quasi-real membrane grants you total concealment.

topic.name: Ectoplasmic Cocoon
topic.para: Ectoplasmic CocoonA: You encapsulate a foe so it can't move.

topic.name: Fabricate, Psionic
topic.para: 4 Fabricate, Psionic: Transforms raw goods to finished items.

topic.name: Quintessence
topic.para: Quintessence: You collapse a bit of time into a physical substance.

topic.name: Hail of Crystals
topic.para: 5 Hail of CrystalsA: A crystal explodes in an area, dealing 9d4 slashing damage.

topic.name: Crystallize
topic.para: 6 Crystallize: Turn subject permanently to crystal.

topic.name: Fabricate, Greater Psionic
topic.para: Fabricate, Greater Psionic: Transforms a lot of raw goods to finished items.

topic.name: Ectoplasmic Cocoon, Mass
topic.para: 7 Ectoplasmic Cocoon, Mass: You encapsulate all foes in a 20-ft. radius.

topic.name: Astral Seed
topic.para: 8 Astral Seed: You plant the seed of your rebirth from the Astral Plane.

topic.name: Genesis
topic.para: 9 GenesisX: You instigate a new demiplane on the Astral Plane.

topic.name: True Creation
topic.para: True CreationX: As psionic major creation, except items are completely real.

topic.name: Telepath
topic.para: Telepath (Telepathy) Discipline Powers

topic.name: Charm, Psionic
topic.para: 1 Charm, PsionicA: Makes one person your friend.

topic.name: Mindlink
topic.para: MindlinkA: You forge a limited mental bond with another creature.

topic.name: Aversion
topic.para: 2 AversionA: Subject has aversion you specify.

topic.name: Brain Lock
topic.para: Brain LockA: Subject cannot move or take any mental actions.

topic.name: Read Thoughts
topic.para: Read Thoughts: Detect surface thoughts of creatures in range.

topic.name: Suggestion, Psionic
topic.para: Suggestion, Psionic: Compels subject to follow stated course of action.

topic.name: Crisis of Breath
topic.para: 3 Crisis of BreathA: Disrupt subject's breathing.

topic.name: Empathic Transfer, Hostile
topic.para: Empathic Transfer, HostileA: Your touch transfers your hurt to another.

topic.name: False Sensory Input
topic.para: False Sensory InputA: Subject sees what isn't there.

topic.name: Dominate, Psionic
topic.para: 4 Dominate, PsionicA: Control target telepathically.

topic.name: Mindlink, Thieving
topic.para: Mindlink, ThievingA: Borrow knowledge of a subject's power.

topic.name: Modify Memory, Psionic
topic.para: Modify Memory, Psionic: Changes 5 minutes of subject's memories.

topic.name: Schism
topic.para: Schism: Your partitioned mind can manifest lower level powers.
5MetaconcertA: Mental concert of two or more increases the total power of the participants.

topic.name: Mind Probe
topic.para: Mind Probe: You discover the subject's secret thoughts.

topic.name: Mind Switch, X
topic.para: 6 Mind SwitchA, X: You switch minds with another.

topic.name: Crisis of Life
topic.para: 7 Crisis of LifeA: Stop subject's heart.

topic.name: Mind Seed
topic.para: 8 Mind SeedX: Subject slowly becomes you.

topic.name: Mind Switch, True
topic.para: 9 Mind Switch, TrueX: A permanent brain swap.

topic.name: Psychic Chirurgery
topic.para: Psychic ChirurgeryX: You repair psychic damage or impart knowledge of new powers.

topic.name: Psychic Warrior Powers
topic.para: Psychic Warrior Powers

topic.name: 1st-Level Psychic Warrior Powers
topic.para: 1ST-LEVEL PSYCHIC WARRIOR POWERS

topic.name: Astral Traveler
topic.para: Astral Traveler: Enable yourself or another to join an astral caravan-enabled trip.

topic.name: Biofeedback
topic.para: BiofeedbackA: Gain damage reduction 2/-.

topic.name: Bite of the Wolf
topic.para: Bite of the Wolf: Gain bite attack for 1d8 damage.

topic.name: Burst
topic.para: Burst: Gain +10 ft. to speed this round.

topic.name: Call Weaponry
topic.para: Call WeaponryA: Create temporary weapon.

topic.name: Catfall
topic.para: CatfallA: Instantly save yourself from a fall.

topic.name: Chameleon
topic.para: Chameleon: Gain +10 enhancement bonus on Hide checks.

topic.name: Claws of the Beast
topic.para: Claws of the BeastA: Your hands become deadly claws.

topic.name: Compression
topic.para: CompressionA: You grow smaller.

topic.name: Conceal Thoughts
topic.para: Conceal Thoughts: You conceal your motives.

topic.name: Detect Psionics
topic.para: Detect Psionics: You detect the presence of psionics.

topic.name: Dissipating Touch
topic.para: Dissipating TouchA: Touch deals 1d6 damage.

topic.name: Distract
topic.para: Distract: Subject gets -4 on Listen, Search, Sense Motive, and Spot checks.

topic.name: Elfsight
topic.para: Elfsight: Gain low-light vision, +2 bonus on Search and Spot checks, and notice secret doors.

topic.name: Empty Mind
topic.para: Empty Mind: Gain +2 on Will saves until your next action.

topic.name: Expansion
topic.para: ExpansionA: Become one size category larger.

topic.name: Float
topic.para: FloatA: Buoy yourself in water or other liquid.

topic.name: Force Screen
topic.para: Force ScreenA: Invisible disc provides +4 shield bonus to AC.

topic.name: Grip of Iron
topic.para: Grip of IronA: Your iron grip gives +4 bonus on grapple checks.

topic.name: Hammer
topic.para: HammerA: Melee touch attack deals 1d8/round.

topic.name: Inertial Armor
topic.para: Inertial ArmorA: Tangible field of force provides you with +4 armor bonus to AC.

topic.name: Metaphysical Claw
topic.para: Metaphysical ClawA: Your natural weapon gains +1 bonus.

topic.name: Metaphysical Weapon
topic.para: Metaphysical WeaponA: Weapon gains +1 bonus.

topic.name: My Light
topic.para: My LightA: Your eyes emit 20-ft. cone of light.

topic.name: Precognition, Defensive
topic.para: Precognition, DefensiveA: Gain +1 insight bonus to AC and saving throws.

topic.name: Precognition, Offensive
topic.para: Precognition, OffensiveA: Gain +1 insight bonus on your attack rolls.

topic.name: Prescience, Offensive
topic.para: Prescience, OffensiveA: Gain +2 insight bonus on your damage rolls.

topic.name: Prevenom
topic.para: PrevenomA: Your claws gain a poison coating.

topic.name: Prevenom Weapon
topic.para: Prevenom WeaponA: Your weapon is mildly venomous.

topic.name: Skate
topic.para: Skate: Subject slides skillfully along the ground.

topic.name: Stomp
topic.para: StompA: Subjects fall prone and take 1d4 nonlethal damage.

topic.name: Synesthete
topic.para: Synesthete: You receive one kind of sense when another sense is stimulated.

topic.name: Thicken Skin
topic.para: Thicken SkinA: Gain +1 enhancement bonus to your AC for 10 min./level.

topic.name: Vigor
topic.para: VigorA: Gain 5 temporary hit points.

topic.name: 2nd-Level Psychic Warrior Powers
topic.para: 2ND-LEVEL PSYCHIC WARRIOR POWERS

topic.name: Animal Affinity
topic.para: Animal AffinityA: Gain +4 enhancement to one ability.

topic.name: Body Adjustment
topic.para: Body AdjustmentA: Heal 1d12 damage.

topic.name: Body Equilibrium
topic.para: Body Equilibrium: You can walk on nonsolid surfaces.

topic.name: Body Purification
topic.para: Body PurificationA: Restore 2 points of ability damage.

topic.name: Concealing Amorpha
topic.para: Concealing Amorpha: Quasi-real membrane grants you concealment.

topic.name: Darkvision, Psionic
topic.para: Darkvision, Psionic: See 60 ft. in total darkness.

topic.name: Detect Hostile Intent
topic.para: Detect Hostile Intent: You can detect hostile creatures within 30 ft. of you.

topic.name: Dimension Swap
topic.para: Dimension SwapA: You and an ally switch positions.

topic.name: Dissolving Touch
topic.para: Dissolving TouchA: Your touch deals 4d6 acid damage.

topic.name: Dissolving Weapon
topic.para: Dissolving WeaponA: Your weapon deals 4d6 acid damage.

topic.name: Empathic Transfer
topic.para: Empathic TransferA: Transfer another's wounds to yourself.

topic.name: Energy Adaptation, Specified
topic.para: Energy Adaptation, SpecifiedA: Gain resistance 10 to one energy type.

topic.name: Feat Leech
topic.para: Feat LeechA: Borrow another's psionic or metapsionic feats.

topic.name: Hustle
topic.para: Hustle: Instantly gain a move action.

topic.name: Levitate, Psionic
topic.para: Levitate, Psionic: You move up and down, forward and back, via mental support.

topic.name: Painful Strike
topic.para: Painful StrikeA: Your natural weapons deal an extra 1d6 nonlethal damage.

topic.name: Prowess
topic.para: Prowess: Instantly gain another attack of opportunity.

topic.name: Psionic Scent
topic.para: Psionic Scent: Gain the scent ability.

topic.name: Psionic Lion's Charge
topic.para: Psionic Lion's ChargeA: You can make full attack in same round you charge.

topic.name: Strength of My Enemy
topic.para: Strength of My EnemyA: Siphon away your enemy's strength and grow stronger.

topic.name: Sustenance
topic.para: Sustenance: You can go without food and water for one day.

topic.name: Thought Shield
topic.para: Thought ShieldA: Gain PR 13 against mind-affecting powers.

topic.name: Wall Walker
topic.para: Wall Walker: Grants ability to walk on walls and ceilings.

topic.name: 3rd-Level Psychic Warrior Powers
topic.para: 3RD-LEVEL PSYCHIC WARRIOR POWERS

topic.name: Claws of the Vampire
topic.para: Claws of the Vampire: Heal half of your claw's base damage.

topic.name: Concealing Amorpha, Greater
topic.para: Concealing Amorpha, Greater: Quasi-real membrane grants you total concealment.

topic.name: Danger Sense
topic.para: Danger Sense: Gain +4 bonus against traps.

topic.name: Dimension Slide
topic.para: Dimension SlideA: Teleports you very short distance.

topic.name: Duodimensional Claw
topic.para: Duodimensional Claw: Increases your natural weapon's threat range.

topic.name: Ectoplasmic Form
topic.para: Ectoplasmic Form: You gain benefits of being insubstantial and can fly slowly.

topic.name: Empathic Feedback
topic.para: Empathic FeedbackA: When you are hit in melee, your attacker takes damage.

topic.name: Empathic Transfer, Hostile
topic.para: Empathic Transfer, HostileA: Your touch transfers your hurt to another.

topic.name: Escape Detection
topic.para: Escape Detection: You become difficult to detect with clairsentience powers.

topic.name: Evade Burst
topic.para: Evade BurstA: You take no damage from a burst on a successful Reflex save.

topic.name: Exhalation of the Black Dragon
topic.para: Exhalation of the Black DragonA: Your acid breath deals 3d6 damage to a close target.

topic.name: Graft Weapon
topic.para: Graft Weapon: Your hand is replaced seamlessly by your weapon.

topic.name: Keen Edge, Psionic
topic.para: Keen Edge, Psionic: Doubles normal weapon's threat range.

topic.name: Mental Barrier
topic.para: Mental BarrierA: Gain +4 deflection bonus to AC until your next action.

topic.name: Ubiquitous Vision
topic.para: Ubiquitous Vision: You have all-around vision.

topic.name: Vampiric Blade
topic.para: Vampiric Blade: You heal half of your base weapon damage.

topic.name: 4th-Level Psychic Warrior Powers
topic.para: 4TH-LEVEL PSYCHIC WARRIOR POWERS

topic.name: Claw of Energy
topic.para: Claw of Energy: Your claws deal additional energy damage.

topic.name: Dimension Door, Psionic
topic.para: Dimension Door, Psionic: Teleports you short distance.

topic.name: Energy Adaptation
topic.para: Energy AdaptationA: Your body converts energy to harmless light.

topic.name: Freedom of Movement, Psionic
topic.para: Freedom of Movement, Psionic: You cannot be held or otherwise rendered immobile.

topic.name: Immovability
topic.para: Immovability: You are almost impossible to move and gain damage reduction 15/-.

topic.name: Inertial Barrier
topic.para: Inertial Barrier: Gain damage reduction 5/-.
Psychic Vampire. Touch attack drains 2 power points/level from foe.

topic.name: Steadfast Perception
topic.para: Steadfast Perception: Gain immunity to illusory effects, +6 bonus on Spot and Search checks.

topic.name: Truevenom
topic.para: Truevenom: Your natural weapons are covered in horrible poison.

topic.name: Truevenom Weapon
topic.para: Truevenom Weapon: Your weapon is horribly poisonous.

topic.name: Weapon of Energy
topic.para: Weapon of Energy: Weapon deals additional energy damage.

topic.name: 5th-Level Psychic Warrior Powers
topic.para: 5TH-LEVEL PSYCHIC WARRIOR POWERS

topic.name: Adapt Body
topic.para: Adapt Body: Your body automatically adapts to hostile environments.

topic.name: Catapsi
topic.para: CatapsiA: Psychic static inhibits power manifestation.

topic.name: Metaconcert
topic.para: MetaconcertA: Mental concert of two or more increases the total power of the participants.

topic.name: Oak Body
topic.para: Oak BodyA: Your body becomes as hard as oak.

topic.name: Psychofeedback
topic.para: Psychofeedback: Boost Str, Dex, or Con at the expense of one or more other scores.

topic.name: 6th-Level Psychic Warrior Powers
topic.para: 6TH-LEVEL PSYCHIC WARRIOR POWERS

topic.name: Breath of the Black Dragon
topic.para: Breath of the Black DragonA: Breathe acid for 11d6 damage.

topic.name: Dispelling Buffer
topic.para: Dispelling Buffer: You are buffered from one dispel psionics effect.

topic.name: Form of Doom
topic.para: Form of DoomA: You transform into a frightening tentacled beast.

topic.name: Mind Blank, Personal
topic.para: Mind Blank, Personal: You are immune to scrying and mental effects.

topic.name: Suspend Life
topic.para: Suspend Life: Put yourself into a state akin to suspended animation.
